html.title: The return of Dofus Arena
html.description: The redevelopment of Dofus Arena by fans, for fans!

hero.description: Arena Returns is a project by fans, for fans whose goal is to relaunch Dofus Arena.

stayInformed.title: Stay informed
stayInformed.description: We communicate mostly on Discord and Twitter. Feel free to keep up to date with future Alpha/Beta's, ask questions to the team or participate in the community.

playNow.title: Join the adventure
playNow.description:
As soon as a test period is announced (Alpha or Beta), you will be able to log into the game through our Launcher.
You can download the Arena Returns Launcher by clicking below.
